LanguageData.BlocksGranite.label: bloic eibhir
LanguageData.BlocksGranite.description: Bloic déanta as eibhear. Cloch crua is ea eibhear.
LanguageData.BlocksLimestone.label: bloic aolchloiche
LanguageData.BlocksMarble.label: bloic marmair
LanguageData.BlocksMarble.description: Bloic déanta as marmar. Cloch bog is ea marmar.
LanguageData.BlocksSandstone.label: bloic gaineamhchloiche
LanguageData.BlocksSandstone.description: Bloic déanta as gaineamhchloch. Cloch bog is ea gaineamhchloch, agus briseann sé go héasca.
LanguageData.BlocksSlate.label: bloic scláta
LanguageData.BlocksSlate.description: Bloic déanta as scláta. Briseann scláta go héasca.
LanguageData.ChunkGranite.label: leadhb eibhir
LanguageData.ChunkGranite.description: Leadhb cloiche. Is féidir é a ghearradh ina mbloic.
LanguageData.ChunkLimestone.label: leadhb aolchloiche
LanguageData.ChunkLimestone.description: Leadhb cloiche. Is féidir é a ghearradh ina mbloic.
LanguageData.ChunkMarble.label: leadhb marmair
LanguageData.ChunkMarble.description: Leadhb cloiche. Is féidir é a ghearradh ina mbloic.
LanguageData.ChunkSandstone.label: leadhb gaineamhchloiche
LanguageData.ChunkSandstone.description: Leadhb cloiche. Is féidir é a ghearradh ina mbloic.
LanguageData.ChunkSlagSteel.label: leadhb chruach
LanguageData.ChunkSlagSteel.description: Leadhb chruach. Is féidir é a bhruithniú chun iarann a fháil.
LanguageData.ChunkSlate.label: leadhb scláta
LanguageData.ChunkSlate.description: Leadhb cloiche. Is féidir é a ghearradh ina mbloic.
LanguageData.Granite.label: eibhear
LanguageData.Limestone.label: aolchloch
LanguageData.Limestone.description: Tá an charraig dhríodair sách bog.
LanguageData.Marble.label: marmar
LanguageData.Marble.description: Tá an charraig mheiteamorfach seo bog.
LanguageData.Sandstone.label: gaineamhchloch
LanguageData.Sandstone.description: Tá an charraig dhríodair seo déanta as gaineamh brúite.
LanguageData.Slate.label: scláta
LanguageData.Slate.description: Tá dath dorcha ar an gcarraig mheiteamorfach seo.
LanguageData.SmoothedGranite.label: eibhear mín
LanguageData.SmoothedLimestone.label: aolchloch mhín
LanguageData.SmoothedLimestone.description: Tá an charraig dhríodair sách bog.
LanguageData.SmoothedMarble.label: marmar mín
LanguageData.SmoothedMarble.description: Tá an charraig mheiteamorfach seo bog.
LanguageData.SmoothedSandstone.label: gaineamhchloch mín
LanguageData.SmoothedSandstone.description: Tá an charraig dhríodair seo déanta as gaineamh brúite.
LanguageData.SmoothedSlate.label: scláta mín
LanguageData.SmoothedSlate.description: Tá dath dorcha ar an gcarraig mheiteamorfach seo.
